creditline: Gift of John and Laura Taft
provenance: Robert Taft (1889-1953, Cincinnati and Washington, D.C.); by descent to John Taft, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: LLC in plate: Seymour Haden | LRC in pencil: Seymour Haden | in LLC in plate: 1864 | title in LLC in plate: Brentford Ferry
text: This the landing point for the Brentford Ferry, which carried passengers across the River Thames between Brentford and Kew. In the time of Francis Seymour Haden, the trains from London came out to the station in Brentford, and those going to the tony district of Kew then took the ferry across the river.
title: Brentford Ferry
